attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BLAIR SHOULD GO NOW --- IN THE NEXT 24 HOURS AND LEAVE NO 10 DOWNING STREET AND THE POSITION HE HOLD OF PRIME MINISTER OF WHAT USED TO BE A GREAT BRITAIN. ONCE HE HAS DEPARTED MAY BE THIS WONDERFUL COUNTRY OF OURS WILL BE GREAT AGAIN.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
